meta_description: Contemporary Art Museum in San Francisco | 685 Mission St, San Francisco, CA 94105
hours_text:
### Hours and Admission

Our Fall Exhibitions are on view. Explore our Exhibitions Calendar to discover an exciting lineup of this season's exhibitions.

[Exhibitions Calendar](/exhibitions)

### MUSEUM HOURS

Now open with new hours!

Monday

Closed

Tuesday

11am - 5pm

Wednesday

11am - 5pm

Thursday

12pm - 8pm

Friday

11am - 5pm

Saturday

11am - 5pm

Sunday

11am - 5pm

### ADMISSION

Walk-in tickets are welcome and available.

MoAD Members & Active Duty Military  

FREE

Adult Admission  

$15

Seniors, Students, Educators  

$7

Youth (under 12)  

FREE

Free Admission  

Every Second Saturday (see events calendar)

‍**THRIVE @ MoAD Community Day  
**  
Join us every Second Saturday for THRIVE @ MoAD Community Day with free admission to all our exhibitions. Across the globe, museums are increasingly being recognized as having an important role to play in promoting personal and social well-being in partnership with the healthcare industry. Studies have shown that engagement with art and culture aid in brain function, processing trauma, and reducing the stigma of mental illness.**‍**  

2025 Holidays

admission_text:
## Admission

**WE’RE INSTALLING NEW EXHIBITIONS!  
‍**We are **closed** from Mar 6, 2024 - Mar 27, 2024 for installation. Visit the [Exhibitions Calendar](https://www.moadsf.org/exhibitions) to learn more about our exciting lineup of new exhibitions.

The Museum of the African Diaspora will be closed on July 4th. Enjoy the holiday, and we look forward to welcoming you during our regular hours soon!

Celebrating 20 years with new hours and new exhibitions Unbound: Art, Blackness and the Universe on view through August 16, 2026, and Continuum on view until March 1, 2026.

**MoAD galleries are closed for installation of our fall exhibitions from Aug 21, 2023 - Sept 26, 2023.**

MoAD Members & Active Duty Military  

FREE

Adult Admission  

$15

Seniors, Students, Educators  

$7

Youth (age 5-12)  

FREE

[Purchase Tickets](https://museumoftheafricandiaspora2.ticketing.veevartapp.com/tickets/view/list/general-admission-unbound)

collections_text:
[](https://www.nexus-sfbay.com/)

# MUSEUM OF THE AFRICAN DIASPORA

MoAD celebrates Black cultures, ignites challenging conversations, and inspires learning through the global lens of the African Diaspora.

VISIT US TO EXPLORE OUR NEW FALL EXHIBITIONS!  
Explore the [event calendar](https://www.moadsf.org/events) to view the full schedule of fall exhibition opening events and community programs!

[VISIT](/visit)
